title: Ozone - bad in troposphere good in stratosphere

content.description:
Directions: Select the choice that best fits each statement. The following question(s) refer to the following air pollutants.
(A) Sulfur dioxide 
(B) Lead
(C) Ozone 
(D) Hydrocarbons 
(E) Particulates
content.question: Considered harmful in the troposphere but beneficial in the stratosphere
